articles.title: Four detained, including prime minister's nephew, during massive pro-EU protest in Poland - Independent.ie
articles.description: Police in Warsaw have said that four people, including the prime minister's nephew, were detained during a massive protest against government policy that critics say could cost Poland its European Union membership.
